page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT IN KELHAM
page.content: The main area of employment in Kelham is at Kelham Hall.Here Newark District Council officials have secretarial staff,groundsmen and kitchen staff. Farming is also important in Kelham where tractor drivers and casual workers work on the farms surrounding the village.The public house employs bar and kitchen staff. The people of Kelham commute to Newark to secretarial jobs,shop assistants and bank workers.Some people also travel to Nottingham,Lincoln and Leeds in their capacity as executives. Teachers travel to Newark and Nottingham.There is little unemployment in this area because people are willing to travel to find jobs.There is no industry except farming and there is a need to re-develop this area to prevent future unemployment.
